Package com.github.m5c.livepoll.persistence

Class PackPersistence

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.m5c.livepoll.persistence.PackPersistence
  • @Component
public class PackPersistence
extends Object
    Helper component to save and load pack files from disk.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor for the PackPersitence component.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PackPersistence

        public PackPersistence​(@Value("${base.dir}")
                       String baseDir)
        Constructor for the PackPersitence component. A folder named "packs" must be within th provided location, for persistence to work. Note that values starting without slash are considered locations relative to the user's home sirectory.
        Parameters:
        baseDir - as the directory to use as base path for configurations and persistence.

    • Method Detail

      • persistPackToDisk

        public String persistPackToDisk​(Pack pack)
                         throws IOException
        Helper method to store a provided pack onject on disk. The object is serialized to json and stored in the configured application basedir (see application.porperties).
        Parameters:
        pack - as the pack object to save to disk.
        Returns:
        String containing absolute path to persisted file on disk.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of a filesystem access error.

      • loadAllPackMetas

        public Map<String,​PackMeta> loadAllPackMetas()
                                            throws IOException
        Searches the configured basedir for persisted packs and creates an indexed map for each. The map translates from PackMeta object to the filename of the associated pack.
        Returns:
        Map of all PackMetas filenames to the correpsonding Pack meta object.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of a files system access error on load.

      • loadPackFromDisk

        public Pack loadPackFromDisk​(String fileName)
                      throws IOException
        Loads a pack object from disk. Searches the packs subdirectory of the basedir configured in application.properties.
        Parameters:
        fileName - as the filename with file-extension of the pack (no full path, just the name).
        Returns:
        deserialized pack object.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the requested file does not exist.

      • deletePack

        public void deletePack​(String testPackDiskLocation)
                throws PackPersistenceException
        Deletes a previously persisted pack object. Includes basic verification to ensure the referenced file actually is a pack.
        Parameters:
        testPackDiskLocation - as absolute path string referencing file to delete.
        Throws:
        PackPersistenceException - in case the pack requested for deletion cannot be found.
